name: Assassin In White
description:
White to be bold. White to not blend into the night. White to give warning. For if you were going to assassinate a man, he was entitled to see you coming.

Objective:
A very early prototype of a game inspired by the Stormlight Archive series, with two levels. You can lash yourself on the walls make that your ground. You can fend off guards, kill them, or when being sneaky, you can snap their throat. You need to find the king and kill him.

Controls:

Basic Movement: Mouse, WASD, and space for jumping

To Lash as object or enemy: Hold E to select the object, face the direction you want to lash it to, and release E

To absorb energy: E (no functionality implemented yet)

To Lash yourself in a different direction: Left click while facing the direction

            - While in the air:

                        - Press W to rotate forward
                        - S to rotate backward
                        - Space to slow down

                           -(auto rotates when near a wall)

          
To summon the Sword: press Q

To attack with the sword: Left mouse click

To choke an enemy: C (only when they are unaware of you)

Glitched and how to fix them:

If gravity is still pulling you down, try lashing again while looking at the floor

If you fly off the ground for whatever reason, just escape to the main menu

Press ESC to go back to the main menu
